Pre-Game Insights: Dallas went 50-32 overall last season while going 25-16 at home. The Mavericks averaged 6.9 steals, 5.0 blocks and 12.1 turnovers per game last season.Indiana went 47-35 overall with a 21-20 record on the road a season ago. The Pacers averaged 123.3 points per game last season, 16.1 from the free-throw line and 39.6 from deep.
Others: Injuries: Mavericks: Dante Exum: out (wrist), Maxi Kleber: day to day (hamstring). Pacers: Aaron Nesmith: day to day (ankle), Isaiah Jackson: out (calf), Andrew Nembhard: day to day (knee), James Wiseman: out (calf).
